name: Really Random Questions
summary: 40 random questions! Can you answer them all?
description: 40 random questions are waiting to see if you can answer them. Can you answer them all the first time around and win the ultimate prize? Good luck!

posts.title: First question

choices.title: Dvd prize
choices.text: Unlucky! But here is your consolation prize! An empty dvd case! Have fun and see you next time!

choices.title: Second question
choices.text: Well done! Here is your second question. Who is Jeremy Kyle?

choices.title: Granny
choices.text: So close yet so far! Your consolation prize is giving a sponge bath to a granny at an old folks home

posts.text: Here is your first random question so I will start off easy. How many wheels does a reliant robin have?
